entry.title: [Global][Public Cloud] MKS upgrades of all managed cluster with an update policy set to ALWAYS UPDATE or to MAXIMUM SECURITY to the latest available patch version.
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 14, 10:00 UTC  -  Dec 16, 05:00 UTC

Dec 12, 22:24 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/12/2022 10:00 UTC
End time : 16/12/2022 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : This maintenance is scheduled to upgrade all clusters with a policy update configured by the customer to ALWAYS UPDATE (through the API Ovhcloud console) or to MAXIMUM SECURITY (through the Manager UI interface). 
With this maintenance, we will upgrade all concerned MKS services to the latest patch version provided by our team. For more details, please refer to the documentation.

entry.title: [SBG5][Public Cloud] - Block Storage
entry.content:
Dec 13, 11:46 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/12/2022 11:16 UTC
End Time : 13/12/2022 11:46 UTC
Service impact : 2% of block storage volumes were unavailable
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

End time : 12/12/2022 16:00 UTC

entry.title: [GRA5][Public Cloud] MKS nodes not reachable
entry.content:
Dec 9, 21:23 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/12/2022 19:00 UTC
End Time : 09/12/2022 21:18 UTC
Root cause : Malfunction of GRA5 openstack's control plane.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 9, 19:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/12/2022 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Managed nodes attached to a Managed Kubernetes Service are shown as NotReady.
Root cause : Diagnostic in progress, it seems to be related to a network outage.
Ongoing actions : Public Cloud team informed.
